eccentricjukebox: I love this... AND YET when it comes to our own selves, those tired old judgy comments are so quick to start playing! Those old records with their worn grooves... that shit drives me crazy. Anyway. You look AMAZING, the dress fits and suits you perfectly, from over here it's just a vision of badassery and confidence and I want to thank you for both modelling this look and being so real about your feelings, it's so appreciated. 💜❤️💜❤️💜
